content: I’m guilty of online arguing and hate myself. I’ve also bore the brunt of it like most others that spending any time at all in online forums or social media. I enjoy the internet an today’s tech that makes it possible, but sometimes I long for the mid-90s or even early 2000s before it became so easy and pervasive. To be honest, I think I was a much more fit, happy and social person before “social” media existed. Life was lived in person instead of staring at a screen sniping at each other via the world wide web.
